Machine Dreams: Biophilia is an immersive journey through the breathtaking beauty of California’s diverse landscapes brought to life by world-renowned artist Refik Anadol. This arstic installation, powered by Google Cloud, a custom server stack, and interactive kiosk, invites visitors to explore the vibrant ecosystems of the Bay, Foothills, Redwoods, and Ocean biome

# Prof. Brooks: Experience the Convergence of Art,Tech and Imagination at EAI ArtsIT 2025

**Steered by Prof. Anthony L. Brooks, EAI ArtsIT 2025 invites artists, researchers, and innovators to explore how technology transforms art and culture. Through performances, installations, paper presentations, and panel discussions, the conference fosters experimentation and dialogue across disciplines.**

In an era where algorithms paint, AR sculptures dance, and immersive worlds invite new forms of presence, **EAI ArtsIT 2025** emerges as a critical nexus: a space where

# FUSING HUMAN CREATIVITY AND ARTIFICIAL IMAGINATION

An ARTECHOUSE Studio Original

About the Exhibit

## World of AI·magination

December 1, 2023 – March 17, 2024

_Discover “_ **_World of AI·magination_** _“: Where human creativity and artificial imagination unlock every pixel to a portal of unlimited wonder._

_World of AI·magination_ is ARTECHOUSE Studio’s latest venture into the dynamic world of generative AI, resulting in a large-scale experiential digital artwork.

A poetic homage to the ageless power of imagination, the mesmerizing audio-visual story underscores the idea that no matter our age or position, a part of us remains in perpetual wonder, always yearning to explore new possibilities.

Title: SIGGRAPH 2025 Experience Hall Ignites the Future of Interaction ...
Author: SIGGRAPH
Published Date: 2025-08-01T15:00:00.000Z
URL: https://s2025.siggraph.org/siggraph-2025-experience-hall-ignites-the-future-of-interaction-and-storytelling/
Text: 
 2025 - 08 - 01  |  Press Releases 
 
 
 
 
 The Experience Hall Returns to SIGGRAPH 2025 With Five Interactive Programs Featuring Boundary-Breaking Art, Technology, and the Debut of Spatial Storytelling. 
 Media Contact: Michelle Ellis 720.432.8130 michelle.ellis@siggraph.org   
 Press Room: s2025.siggraph.org/for-the-press/ 
 VANCOUVER, B.C. – 1 August 2025 – The SIGGRAPH Experience Hall has always been more than a show floor; it’s a portal. At SIGGRAPH 2025, that portal opens again, inviting attendees to step inside the future of creation, connection, and immersive exploration. From Monday, 11 August through Thursday, 14 August at the Vancouver Convention Centre, the Experience Hall will showcase five distinct programs, Art Gallery

Title: Top 5 Tech-Driven Art Installations: Exploring AI, AR, and VR ...
Author: Pooja Khanna Tyagi
Published Date: 2025-06-28T00:00:00.000Z
URL: https://www.yankodesign.com/2025/06/28/top-5-tech-driven-art-installations-exploring-ai-ar-and-vr-innovations/
Text: Immersive and interactive art installations are redefining how audiences engage with art, moving beyond passive observation to active participation. As these installations gain popularity, their experiences often merge physical spaces with digital technology, creating narrative-driven environments that immerse visitors in entirely new worlds. Tools like augmented reality (AR), virtual reality (VR), and projection mapping enhance these experiences, blurring the boundaries between the real and the imagined.

These multisensory setups are not only visually captivating but also challenge the norms of traditional art installations. Today’s immersive art is evolving rapidly, with exhibitions inviting deeper emotional and physical i
